name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Today, a postgraduate student from the Huaxi Clinical Department of Sichuan University died of cardiac arrest after being diagnosed with COVID-19 and still insisted on working.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
There is actually no need to discuss this on domestic social media
Because it is obvious that people can cite various tragic situations after the relaxation of the policy abroad to prove the mistakes of the relaxation and the problems that will be faced next
But if you want to cite the experiences of those who jumped off buildings, starved to death, and could not get medical treatment during the lockdown, your account will explode.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of the 13th, Xuzhou Xuzhou Medical Affiliated Hospital resident trainees protested
It is reported that Xuzhou Medical Affiliated Hospital resident trainees were not given the proper protective measures by the departments, and the hospital departments did not issue N95/KN95 masks, and required them to be on duty
During the protest the day before, the hospital only allowed graduate students to take a holiday, but did not allow resident trainees to take a holiday.
As a result, the resident trainees continued to protest today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens’ supplements on resident trainees

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: There is currently no solution

content: Note: Google search results for Telegram are polluted with phishing ads from Chinese companies.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens’ contributions On Weibo, there is a topic about the future of nucleic acid testing companies, in which many former big shots talked about their current feelings.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the topic of the postponement of the postgraduate entrance examination has been widely discussed.
Yesterday, an accident occurred. A volunteer exposed the examination bag with barcodes on Weibo, which aroused the speculation of many candidates about the leakage of examination questions.
As for whether there is a leakage of examination questions, it is currently unknown, but it is certain that this year's postgraduate examination will most likely not be postponed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Wu Hao's arrest can be regarded as the end of an era. It may be difficult for netizens today to imagine that twelve years ago, government officials would argue with netizens on Weibo.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In April 2020, the "fever-reducing magic drug" Analgin was removed from the market by the National Medical Products Administration due to frequent serious side effects.
But recently, Analgin has reappeared on the list of drugs for people infected with the new coronavirus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @mxd1439 Cool?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: There are currently two opinions in the comment section, and netizens are welcome to make more additions in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Paper published an article saying that the news that a student from West China Hospital died suddenly while working while ill was false and that they were still being rescued.
However, students from the school who had been paying attention and providing information said that the patient's case had been sealed and that he was most likely dead.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zhejiang netizens contributed:
(The authenticity of the original image has been confirmed, only the text content is published here)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens submitted nursing records of a classmate who died of overwork at West China Hospital. The records show that the current vital signs are completely maintained by LUCUS, and the lowest diastolic blood pressure is only 13.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The orthodox epidemic prevention is in Shandong
A netizen submitted an article saying that he went to Shandong to visit relatives. He was originally in self-isolation at his relative's home because of abnormal nucleic acid test, but he was still taken to the quarantine center on the evening of the 13th.
According to the contributor, people are still being pulled in.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the same time, China National Radio reported on December 14 that road closures had occurred in Shandong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: User contributions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Breaking news! Tonight, at the Jinda Road subway entrance in Zhengzhou, an excavator kept spinning at the intersection and damaged surrounding vehicles, and was then shot dead by the police who rushed to the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added that the current casualties are unknown
